price: អ្វីៗដែលនៅលើមេឃជាច្រើនជាន់ និងផែនដីបានលើក តម្កើងចំពោះអល់ឡោះដោយទ្រង់មហាខ្លាំងពូកែ មហាគតិបណ្ឌិត។
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
